speaker: agent
column15: Zero-Based Budgeting (ZBB) Approach for Overhead Costs: ZBB requires every rupee of expenditure to be justified afresh rather than using last year as base. Step 1 - Define decision units: Each overhead function (HR, Finance, IT, Admin, Legal) becomes a decision unit. Step 2 - Create decision packages: For each function, build minimum service level package (say 70% of current spend) and enhancement packages. Step 3 - Rank packages by value delivered. Step 4 - Fund packages until budget is exhausted. Key benefits: Eliminates cost creep; Challenges entrenched spending; Typically delivers 10-25% overhead savings. Recommended scope for FY 2026-27: Admin, HR, and IT (₹28 Cr combined). Exclude direct costs from ZBB - apply to overheads only.
